reviewText: This legendary DVD is a must for anyone who needs to enjoy some clean and incredibly funny man and lets us feel honoured that such a man existed and has been able to leave behind records for us to enjoy whenever we can! My collection of such a talented man with a wonderful sense of humour is nearly complete!!  Remember I have followed his career some 50 or more years, when I first HEARD  his recordings from way back in the early 1950's! Long time!

reviewText: I love Victor Borge and this film was amazing so funny and unique because of the wonderful Victor Borge.The film is really funny and when it is over you really wants more!! Highly recomended for a good and funny time.
